TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebPartTransformer extends System.Object

summary.span: 为转换器类提供基本实现，以便在两个不兼容的连接点之间转换数据。

span.span: Provides basic implementation for transformer classes to convert data between two incompatible connection points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换器用于将两个连接点不兼容的 Web 部件控件之间的数据转换。Transformers are used to translate data between two Web Parts controls with incompatible connection points. 它们提供或使用通过不同的接口的数据时，连接点不兼容。Connection points are incompatible when they provide or consume data through different interfaces. 例如，实现提供程序连接点的类型的提供程序无法直接连接到客户期望的类型的提供者连接点。For example, a provider implementing a provider connection point of type could not directly connect to a consumer expecting a provider connection point of type . 相反，转换器必须用于连接两个 Web 部件控件。Instead, a transformer must be used to connect the two Web Parts controls. 转换器接受的提供者连接点支持的类型的数据。The transformer accepts data of the type supported by the provider connection point. 它会将该数据使用者连接点支持的类型转换的必要内部处理。It does the necessary internal processing to convert that data into the type supported by the consumer connection point. 转换器可以提供用户界面 (UI) 的用户可以配置转换器在连接模式下。A transformer can provide a user interface (UI) that allows the user to configure the transformer when in the connect mode. 通过检索配置控制方法，并且显示 Web 部件连接区域中。The configuration control is retrieved through the method and is displayed in a Web Parts connections zone. 是一个抽象类，必须进行扩展以提供不同类型的连接点之间的自定义的翻译。 is an abstract class and must be extended to provide customized translations between different types of connection points. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建派生的自定义的转换器类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a customized transformer that derives from the class. 转换器，名为`RowToStringTransformer`，允许 Web 部件提供程序和 Web 部件使用者连接点不兼容的连接。The transformer, named `RowToStringTransformer`, allows for a Web Parts provider and Web Parts consumer with incompatible connection points to be connected. 提供程序提供的数据类型，使用者接受类型的数据，但。The provider presents data of type , but the consumer accepts only data of type . `RowToStringTransformer`类执行必要的转换。The `RowToStringTransformer` class performs the necessary conversion. 代码示例不包括提供程序或使用者实现。The code example does not include an implementation of the provider or consumer. 必须创建实现的提供程序接口和通过自定义的接口名为预期数据使用者`IString`为示例正常运行。You must create a provider that implements the interface and a consumer that expects data through a customized interface named `IString` for the example to work. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/CS/TransformerSource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/VB/TransformerSource.vb#5)] 代码示例的第一个部分包含的提供程序和使用者 Web 部件控件和转换器的代码的代码。The first section of the code example contains code for the provider and consumer Web Parts controls, and the code for the transformer. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/CS/TransformerSource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/VB/TransformerSource.vb#4)] 第二个部分的代码示例演示了如何包括中的声明性语法转换器对象。The second section of the code example shows how to include the transformer within the declarative syntax for a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/CS/Transformer.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartTransformer_Overview/VB/Transformer.aspx#1)] 必须在指定的自定义的转换器``Web.config 文件可用于在网页中使用的部分。A customized transformer must be specified in the `` section of the Web.config file to be available for use in a Web page. 第三个部分的代码示例演示如何将自定义的转换器添加到 Web.config 文件。The third section of the code example shows how to add the customized transformer to the Web.config file. ```vb ``` ```csharp ``` 代码示例包括使你能够更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式的用户控件。The code example includes a user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. 用户控件的源代码来自另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 可以获取从用户控件的.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)，并且必须将它放置在.aspx 页所在的文件夹中。You can obtain the .ascx file for the user control from [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0), and it must be placed in the same folder as the .aspx page.

summary.span: 在 区域中显示配置转换器的 ASP.NET 控件。

span.span: Displays an ASP.NET control that configures a transformer in the zone.

returns.span: 配置转换器的 ASP.NET 控件。

span.span: An ASP.NET control that configures a transformer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换器需要用户对其进行配置时，可以显示配置控件。A configuration control can be displayed when a transformer requires a user to configure it. 配置控件提供用户界面 (UI) 允许用户选择的值将被转换。The configuration control provides a user interface (UI) that allows the user to select which values will be transformed. 在连接区域中呈现。It is rendered in a connections zone. 配置控件必须实现接口。The configuration control must implement the interface.

span.span: Loads the configuration state saved with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将加载到用来配置转换器的 ASP.NET 控件的已保存的配置状态。Use this method to load the saved configuration state into the ASP.NET control used to configure a transformer.

summary.span: 将用户设置的配置状态保存在 ASP.NET 配置控件中。

span.span: Saves the configuration state set by the user in the ASP.NET configuration control.
An object representing the configuration state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将配置数据集保存在用于配置转换器的 ASP.NET 控件。Use this method to save the configuration data set in the ASP.NET control used to configure a transformer.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示要转换的数据。

span.span: An representing the data to be transformed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在实现时，必须重写此方法类。You must override this method when implementing the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中的自定义方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a customized class. 它是在中找到一个更大示例的一部分类概述。It is part of a larger example found in the class overview.
